title: League of Yasuo? or?
body:
This is getting ridiculous.... 

HE'S NOT EVEN THAAAAAT FUN

replies.body: its because noobs keep feeding the noob yasuo, its a vicious cycle where noobs do well 1 game with yasuo, then the noobs wont drop him and they make me sick when I see how bad they are
As much as I want to disagree with this I can't, this is how a normal champion is decided in the lower elo's.
It's because he is an easy carry man, People don't like playing champions who actually need resource management and ability management.

I don't feel at all like he's an easy carry. One CC ability and he's done for. Sure you could say that about most champions but this guy is melee and he's squishy and he can't just press R and be back behind his team where it's safe like a Zed could.
Weaboo don't even get played no more son
I can be your hero baby!!!!
come pik me up den bb
